I've taken the liberty of adding some numbers to my username. Thankfully, this one I'm sticking with...Picarto literally won't let me do it after this.
Oh yeah, their ridiculous "only 2 name changes per account" policy >_>
That's why I made this account with my old email that I don't use anymore.
So when I finally decide on a new name, I can use my current one without penalty <3
I actually like the consistency. Also, hello Noodle.
I have this thing where I don't like "lifetime" systems
Being more generous with how often stuff can happen, or limiting how often it can happen are much more preferable to me.
But Picarto's policy seems very restrictive.
Time for lunch. Toodle-oo for now.

day off but still very busy
finally got my u.a. youtooz ship notice :3
Yeah... I got no offers worth my time.
I'll chalk it up to I tried on a Thursday after 6pm.
were they too far to be worth it?
We're talking 25 - 35 minute drives just to get to the stores
There was only one worth doing potentially because it was a $24 double order, BUT it was delivery-only.  So I'd drive to the store, pick them up, then make the drops.
My understanding is:  Yeah, you might get a huge tax write-off for driving a bunch of miles
But unless you make enough money to be taxed more than you can deduce, you're effectively screwing yourself
yeah double and combo runs probably the way to go if ya can
